id.description: Optional identifier for this branch point.

prompt.description: The prompt displayed to the presenter (e.g., "What do you do?").

options.description: The available options. MUST contain at least one option.

description:
A BranchPoint is a decision point at a node where the presenter
must choose between multiple options.

When the engine encounters a BranchPoint, it MUST display the prompt
and options, then wait for the presenter to Choose.
